full_summary:
=================
**Title**
_____________________
Ultra-Low Temperature Upright Freezer
_____________________________________

**Tender Notice**
_________________\*
Government Contracting Agency: | Canadian Food Inspection Agency

**Solicitation Number**
_____________________
2023-00331

**Contracting Entity Information**
--------------------------------
*   Contracting Entity Name: | Canadian Food Inspection Agency
    Contracting Entity Address Line: | 1400 Merivale Road, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0Y9
    Contact Information:
    Name: Shawn Doyle
    Email: Shawn.doyle@inspection.gc.ca
    Phone: 343-575-4515  

**Procurement Category**
-----------------------

*   Procurement Category: Goods
*   Classification: Laboratory Equipment and Supplies (G-SIN: N6640)

**Procurement Overview**
------------------------

*   The Canadian Food Inspection Agency intends to purchase and commission three ultra-low temperature freezers for the storage of organic materials and reference samples.
*   The freezers will be used at the Dartmouth Laboratory, Longueuil Laboratory, and Saint-Hyacinthe Laboratory.
*   The contracting agency may also reserve the option to purchase up to four additional freezers, bringing the total to seven freezers.
*   The option to purchase additional freezers expires on March 2026.  

**Terms and Conditions**
----------------------

*   The procurement will be conducted under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
*   In addition, the procurement will be subject to the requirements of the "Goods and Services Classification System" (CSGS) and the applicable trade agreements.  

**Submission Requirements**
------------------------------

*   Bidders must submit their proposals electronically.
*   All additional information and documents will be made accessible through the Canadian government's e-buying system.
*   Tenderers are required to register with the Canadian government procurement website and download the tender documents prior to submission.  

**Download Link**
--------------------

*   You can download the RFP document by visiting the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/30/1c28fde1728ceb1a1b17503ce7723173/2023-00331_-_npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/30/1c28fde1728ceb1a1b17503ce7723173/2023-00331
